analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.finalize (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#743-754):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#752)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#752-754)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#542-638):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#550-562)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#567-571)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#611-612)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#607-609)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#542-638):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#550-562)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#567-571)
	- pricingStrategy.isPresalePurchase(receiver) (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#612-613)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleWeiRaised (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#613)

CrowdsaleExt.investInternal has external calls inside a loop:
	- crowdsale.updateEarlyParicipantWhitelist(msg.sender,this,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#632-634)

CrowdsaleExt.setEndsAt has external calls inside a loop:
	- time > crowdsale.startsAt() (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#900-901)

ReservedTokensFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale has external calls inside a loop:
	- j < token.reservedTokensDestinationsLen() (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol)

ReservedTokensFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale has external calls inside a loop:
	- i < token.reservedTokensDestinationsLen() (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol)

ReservedTokensFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale has external calls inside a loop:
	- allocatedBonusInTokens = token.getReservedTokensListValInTokens(token.reservedTokensDestinations(i)) (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol)

ReservedTokensFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(token.reservedTokensDestinations(i),allocatedBonusInTokens) (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol)

ReservedTokensFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale has external calls inside a loop:
	- percentsOfTokensUnit = token.getReservedTokensListValInPercentageUnit(token.reservedTokensDestinations(j)) (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol)

ReservedTokensFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale has external calls inside a loop:
	- percentsOfTokensDecimals = token.getReservedTokensListValInPercentageDecimals(token.reservedTokensDestinations(j)) (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol)

ReservedTokensFinalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(token.reservedTokensDestinations(j),allocatedBonusInPercentage) (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.CrowdsaleExt (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#492-528):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#508-512)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endsAt (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#522-524)
	- isUpdatable (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#528)
	- isWhiteListed (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#528)
	- minimumFundingGoal (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#525-528)
	- multisigWallet (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#512)
	- startsAt (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#521)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.investInternal (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#542-638):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.Funding (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#550-562)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised - presaleWeiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#567-571)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#602-605)
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#599)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#605-607)

Reentrancy in CrowdsaleExt.preallocate (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#656-670):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#658)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#662-666)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#666-668)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#661-662)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#660-661)

CrowdsaleExt.getState (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#985-1006) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#1001-1006)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#1001-1006)

CrowdsaleExt.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#370-373)
FractionalERC20Ext.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#351)
FractionalERC20Ext.minCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#351)
UpgradeAgent.originalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0xb786a7103b80c85840905de34611260a6e7775f0.sol#1169-1171)
